sentences.en: " Here's his bracelet and his silver chain and medallion.
sentences.cn: “ 这是他的手镯,项链和那小圆牌.

sentences.en: A gold bracelet dangled from his left wrist.
sentences.cn: 一只金手镯在他的左手腕上晃来晃去。

sentences.en: A silver bracelet with some intricate scrollwork . clung to his right wrist.
sentences.cn: 右腕有一只花纹细致的银手镯.

sentences.en: Gold charms dangled from her bracelet.
sentences.cn: 她的手镯上挂着许多金饰物。

sentences.en: Hanging from his right wrist is a heavy gold bracelet.
sentences.cn: 他的右腕上戴着一只沉甸甸的金手镯。

sentences.en: He picked the bracelet up for me.
sentences.cn: 他帮我把手镯捡了起来。

sentences.en: Her bracelet was set with emeralds.
sentences.cn: 她的手镯上镶着绿宝石.

sentences.en: Joyce has been under a cloud since her roommate's bracelet disappeared.
sentences.cn: 自从室友的手镯不见以后,乔伊斯一直受到怀疑.

sentences.en: She could see the sun flashing off his silver bracelet.
sentences.cn: 她看见他手上的银镯子在阳光下闪烁.

sentences.en: She left her gold bracelet as a pledge.
sentences.cn: 她留下她的金手镯作抵押品.

sentences.en: The bracelet was made with exquisite workmanship.
sentences.cn: 这只手躅做得巧夺天工.

sentences.en: The diamond bracelet is very beautiful.
sentences.cn: 那个钻石手镯非常漂亮.

sentences.en: The jeweler charges lots of money to set diamonds in a bracelet.
sentences.cn: 珠宝匠要很多钱才肯把钻石镶在手镯上.

sentences.en: When Mary broke her bracelet, she was at the point of tears.
sentences.cn: 当玛丽把心爱的手镯摔坏时, 她几乎哭了出来.

trans.tran_en: a band or chain that you wear around your wrist or arm as a decoration
